attributes.title: Huge disappointment!
attributes.review: So I heard about this app to stay connected to our great president and keep up with all the newest info, because as we all know the world is full of fake news, except Fox News of course. So I got on but the words looked like they were written by a 5 year old. At first I thought it was a mistake but everywhere there was first grade level grammar and punctuation. And it took a long time to download. My internet and WiFi are very good but it took about an hour to download. And then another half hour to get into the app. The whole thing was just slow and it lagged a lot. And a lot of the information was very wrong. It did nothing to mention his homophobic comments and actions or his blatant sexism and pedophilia. It especially had no coverage of all the racist comments and actions that have been proven true. It really let me down. I did so want to learn about the president but it was like he wanted to brainwash people with his supposed greatness. I really donâ€™t recommend this app for anyone to use as itâ€™s just another place trump will use to spread lies and another place for his brainwashed followers to congregate and plan more harm to the POCâ€™s, LGBTQ+, women, and other such communities. This app was a nightmare for anyone who actually wants to make America great for all people including those previously mentioned.
